name: Let Us Out!
description:
Let Us Out! is our group entry for a Minijam of our video game course. Developed in under 3 days, it's a puzzle mini-game with cute animations and charismatic characters.

The main theme was different songs to choose from, we decided to choose "The Beatles - Help!" and "Cover Tune Grab Bag -" Ob-La-Di, Ob-La-Da ".

Our inspiration was to help our characters escape the room and with the second song, put them in a queue when the player gets a new friend.

Hope you enjoy it!

The team:

Xavier Aguilera - 3D Artist

Marc Andrada - Developer

Samantha Bello - 3D Artist

Alejandro Escartín - Logo Designer

Jordi Tomàs - Developer
